SAMPLE NOTES
TOPIC: choosing the number of courses to take
his choices:
take 4 courses (full time)
take 5 courses (more than full time)
reason for taking 5 courses:
could possibly graduate early
reasons against taking 5 courses:
more than full time
too much work
not currently doing well in 4 courses
opinion:
better to take only 4 courses if only doing OK in 4
OK to take 5 courses only if doing really well in 4
